title: Was Genie Francis ever crowned the Azalea Festival Queen and then stripped of it?  Seem to recall she was the Azalea Queen many, many years ago and then badmouthed the experience so they removed her name from the list of former Azalea Queens.  Can\'t find anything about that on the internet.
text:
Soap opera star Genie Francis was a celebrity guest at the festival
in 1983, but she was not an Azalea Queen.
